price: “Bitari Allah, maze muberekeze mu nzira igana umuriro ugurumana”,
arabic: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَٱهۡدُوهُمۡ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: min dūni al-lahi fa-ih'dūhum ilā ṣirāṭi al-jaḥīmi
